nodes.excerpt: Powered by tens of thousands of popular fully responsive visuals, SYQEL VJ is a simple to use desktop application that enables users to instantly visualize their mic or desktop audio feeds & easily use it as a window source in OBS or other broadcasting apps.
nodes.title: SYQEL VJ - Automatic responsive visuals for your streams
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: SYQEL VJ是一款简单易用的桌面应用程序，它能让用户将他们的麦克风或桌面音频馈送即时可视化，并轻松地将其作为OBS或其他广播应用程序的窗口源。
localize.tagline: 为您的流媒体提供自动响应的视觉效果

localize.description: SYQEL VJ是一款簡單易用的桌面應用程序，它能讓用戶將他們的麥克風或桌面音頻饋送即時可視化，並輕鬆地將其作爲OBS或其他廣播應用程序的窗口源。
localize.tagline: 爲您的流媒體提供自動響應的視覺效果

nodes.excerpt: Iteratively prevents wasted time, increased costs, and poor decision-making from bad data by giving product, data and engineering teams the opportunity to collaborate on analytics while enforcing your schema. We empower you to take control of your data 🚀

nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 通过给产品、数据和工程团队提供合作分析的机会，同时执行您的模式，迭代地防止因不良数据而浪费时间、增加成本和不良决策。我们使您能够控制您的数据🚀。

nodes.excerpt: Signing bad contracts is the worst. TermScout uses NLP + human attorneys to analyze more than 600 data points in common SaaS agreements and rates them based on customer favorability. Less negotiating, less legal, less confusion. Stop signing bad contracts!
nodes.title: TermScout - Free reviews and ratings on top SaaS contracts
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 签坏合同是最糟糕的。TermScout利用NLP+人类律师分析常见SaaS协议中的600多个数据点，并根据客户好感度进行评分。减少谈判、减少法律、减少困惑。别再签烂合同了!
localize.tagline: 对顶级SaaS合同的免费审查和评级

localize.description: 籤壞合同是最糟糕的。TermScout利用NLP+人類律師分析常見SaaS協議中的600多個數據點，並根據客戶好感度進行評分。減少談判、減少法律、減少困惑。別再籤爛合同了!
localize.tagline: 對頂級SaaS合同的免費審查和評級

Add, delete, and move items around as if you were using the tool to manage your own products.

nodes.excerpt: Stop slacking, start rocking. ⠀ 🏖️ Purpose-built for remote work 🤘 Messaging, tasks, notes & files in one space 🤝 Work with clients, freelancers & partners from the same space 🚘 Integrates with Google Drive and Zoom 🛣️ Available on Web, iOS and Android

nodes.excerpt: Pickle helps companies understand every phone and video conversation they have with their customers. We do this by automatically transcribing calls and extracting key insights, questions, and trends.

localize.description: Pickle帮助企业了解他们与客户的每一次电话和视频对话。我们通过自动转录电话并提取关键见解、问题和趋势来实现这一目标。

nodes.excerpt: Gleek.io is a diagram maker focused on speed ⏱ - typing code is much faster than drag-and-drop - for developers, it is more natural to write than to draw - generate a diagram with connections Create your first diagram in Gleek.io & write your feedback 🙏

nodes.excerpt: Stay on top of your company's leaves and keep track of who's in and out of the office at all times with Vacation Tracker. Send and approve leave requests in seconds, manage employee quotas, manage company leave policies, and avoid missed deadlines.
nodes.title: Vacation Tracker for Microsoft Teams - Remote-friendly leave tracking solution for Microsoft Teams.
nodes.author: Slobodan Stojanović

localize.description: 有了Vacation Tracker，你就可以随时掌握公司的休假情况，并跟踪谁在办公室内外的情况。在几秒钟内发送和批准休假申请，管理员工配额，管理公司休假政策，并避免错过最后期限。
localize.tagline: 为微软团队提供远程友好的休假跟踪解决方案。

localize.description: 有了Vacation Tracker，你就可以隨時掌握公司的休假情況，並跟蹤誰在辦公室內外的情況。在幾秒鐘內發送和批准休假申請，管理員工配額，管理公司休假政策，並避免錯過最後期限。

nodes.excerpt: SaaSync retrieves invoices and other data from QBO or Xero. This data is transformed ready for use with ChartMogul. Data that can't be automatically synced appears in a review screen where SaaSync users can edit it before pushing remaining data to ChartMogul.
nodes.title: SaaSync - Integrate QuickBooks Online and Xero with ChartMogul
nodes.author: Nick Franklin

localize.description: SaaSync从QBO或Xero检索发票和其他数据。这些数据经过转换后可用于ChartMogul。不能自动同步的数据会出现在审查屏幕上，SaaSync用户可以在将剩余数据推送到ChartMogul之前对其进行编辑。
localize.tagline: 用ChartMogul整合QuickBooks Online和Xero。

localize.description: SaaSync從QBO或Xero檢索發票和其他數據。這些數據經過轉換後可用於ChartMogul。不能自動同步的數據會出現在審查屏幕上，SaaSync用戶可以在將剩餘數據推送到ChartMogul之前對其進行編輯。
localize.tagline: 用ChartMogul整合QuickBooks Online和Xero。

nodes.excerpt: Abacum is a financial planning tool for mid-sized companies. Save time by integrating data sources and automating manual processes. Generate better insights with analytical tools built for finance-users. Collaborate easily across teams and locations.
nodes.title: Abacum - Helping finance teams deliver business insights 10x faster
nodes.author: Lindsay Wiese-Amos

localize.description: Abacum是一款针对中型企业的财务规划工具。通过整合数据源和自动化手动流程来节省时间。通过为财务用户设计的分析工具产生更好的洞察力。跨团队和地点轻松协作。
localize.tagline: 帮助财务团队以10倍的速度提供业务洞察力。

localize.description: Abacum是一款針對中型企業的財務規劃工具。通過整合數據源和自動化手動流程來節省時間。通過爲財務用戶設計的分析工具產生更好的洞察力。跨團隊和地點輕鬆協作。
localize.tagline: 幫助財務團隊以10倍的速度提供業務洞察力。

nodes.excerpt: http://www.crikle.com is a web-based sales solution that combines video calling with customised sales guidance and actionable information capture, to sell quickly. Less admin, more sales. Everything your team needs to convert more customers, faster.

nodes.excerpt: Worksphere is workplace management software for companies offering employees options to work in-office or remote. Worksphere automates desk booking, safe entry, and gives you office usage data to right-size your workplace.

nodes.excerpt: Discovering & outreaching new leads through LinkedIn has never been easier than with Skylead. With our brand new email & hyper-image personalization features, you’ll be able to take communication to a whole new level and skyrocket your sales processes.

nodes.excerpt: Create your video once - publish it everywhere. Cut different pieces of content from your video and change the aspect ratio to share them across all your social networks.
nodes.title: Repurpose Video Content - Cherry-pick highlights & turn them into standalone videos 🍒
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 一次性创建您的视频 - 到处发布。从您的视频中剪切不同的内容，并改变长宽比，以便在您的所有社交网络上分享它们。
localize.tagline: 挑选亮点并将其转化为独立的视频 🍒。

localize.description: 一次性創建您的視頻 - 到處發佈。從您的視頻中剪切不同的內容，並改變長寬比，以便在您的所有社交網絡上分享它們。
localize.tagline: 挑選亮點並將其轉化爲獨立的視頻 🍒。

nodes.excerpt: Work faster with parts suppliers from idea to production. Get instant quotes for your designs, source new verified suppliers around the world, get feedback directly from suppliers to avoid mistakes and produce even the most complex parts with minimum delays.
nodes.title: Jiga - Build hardware faster
nodes.author: Yonatan Wolowelsky

localize.description: 从创意到生产，与零部件供应商合作更快。为您的设计获取即时报价，在全球范围内寻找新的经过验证的供应商，直接从供应商处获得反馈，以避免错误，并以最少的延误生产最复杂的零件。
localize.tagline: 更快地建立硬件

localize.description: 從創意到生產，與零部件供應商合作更快。爲您的設計獲取即時報價，在全球範圍內尋找新的經過驗證的供應商，直接從供應商處獲得反饋，以避免錯誤，並以最少的延誤生產最複雜的零件。
localize.tagline: 更快地建立硬件

nodes.excerpt: Mailmodo is an email marketing tool, powered by AMP Emails, enabling users to create & send app-like interactive emails to improve conversions. As interactions happen inside the email, users can take action seamlessly within the email.
nodes.title: Mailmodo - Boost email conversions with interactive AMP emails.
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Mailmodo是一款电子邮件营销工具，由AMP Email提供支持，使用户能够创建和发送类似应用的交互式电子邮件，以提高转化率。由于互动发生在邮件内部，用户可以在邮件中无缝地采取行动。
localize.tagline: 利用交互式AMP电子邮件提高电子邮件的转化率。

localize.description: Mailmodo是一款電子郵件營銷工具，由AMP Email提供支持，使用戶能夠創建和發送類似應用的交互式電子郵件，以提高轉化率。由於互動發生在郵件內部，用戶可以在郵件中無縫地採取行動。
localize.tagline: 利用交互式AMP電子郵件提高電子郵件的轉化率。
